messages.subject: Re: UL Re: Books and the Internet
messages.msgSnippet: ... Sometimes I have a lot of time for e-mail and sometimes I m really limited so................... I either delete a lot when I m busy,  or file messages in
messages.messageBody:
> > I have only recently started using E mail and the Internet and I am
> > beginning to feel that it takes up far more of my time than I'd like. I am
> > seriously considering signing off completely. Have any of you felt this way?
> > If so hoe do you handle it?
> >
Sometimes I have a lot of time for e-mail and sometimes I'm really
limited so...................
I either delete a lot when I'm busy, or file messages in an "unread"
file to read at a later date. Sorting the messages by subject makes
it easy to catch any that I want to read right away. I think, like
anything else in life, it's a constant balancing act. I figure out
what I can handle and go from there. Some people can handle several
busy lists. For me, a couple are enough.

Diane in KS


>
> *** To unsubscribe: Send a message to Majordomo@... In the body write:
> unsubscribe unschooling-list [OR] unsubscribe unschooling-list-digest
>
